description:
Hero of Highway 35 and AcceleRacers, Ballistik™ is a bullet born for pure speed, thanks to its super aerodynamic line that cuts through the air creating an almost zero friction effect. A blade of extreme and futuristic design that will slice even the most formidable opponents. From the style of Ballistik™ to the muscles of Muscle Tone™, driven on Highway 35 by Krakatoa, by Team Scorchers. Not having a leading role in the movie, it desires redemption and admiration. This drive is its extra weapon to always be at its best on every race. Add Highway 35 Free Pack to your collection!

This DLC includes:
- Ballistik™
- Muscle Tone™
name: HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™ 2 - Highway 35 Free Pack
